Module com.pld.agile
Package com.pld.agile.controller

Class ComputedTourState

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.controller.ComputedTourState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
public class ComputedTourState extends Object implements State
State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, and the tour is computed. User can load another map, load another list of requests or change the tour.
